comments.author: Dave
comments.body: With Burton sequestered away in Gomerville for God knows how long, I'm in the market for new heels at which to nip. I've put a notice up on the corkboard down at Fraser Meadows, but no calls yet. Ditto neighborhood elementary schools. If you know of anyone who'd like to join us most days at noon, please don't be shy; let 'em know about the Frenzy. Government scientists have determined that a strenuous mid-day workout improves the health and sharpens the mind. Just look at [me.](http://www.colorado.edu/its/security/awareness/) Oh, never mind.
